strengths.label: Innovative Thinking
strengths.description: Sees possibilities others overlook, finds smarter solutions, and improves work efficiency.

strengths.label: Independent Worker
strengths.description: Excels at completing tasks autonomously, managing work efficiently without frequent guidance.

strengths.label: Conceptual Thinking
strengths.description: Easily grasps abstract and complex concepts, suitable for strategic analysis and long-term planning.

strengths.label: Continuous Improvement
strengths.description: Focuses on process optimization, constantly enhancing project efficiency and outcomes.

strengths.label: Objective Judgment
strengths.description: Makes decisions based on facts, gaining trust and respect from colleagues.

strengths.label: Consistent Performance
strengths.description: Reliable in completing important tasks accurately and excellently.

weaknesses.label: Socially Awkward
weaknesses.description: Not good at self-promotion or networking; strengths may be overlooked.

weaknesses.label: Resistant to Restrictions
weaknesses.description: Dislikes meaningless rules, may clash with authority or organizational constraints.

weaknesses.label: Neglects Interpersonal Interaction
weaknesses.description: Can overlook workplace politics and informal communication, missing important signals.

weaknesses.label: Reluctant to Delegate
weaknesses.description: Overconfident, often takes on too much work or avoids assigning responsibility to others.

weaknesses.label: Feedback Too Direct
weaknesses.description: In pursuit of truth and efficiency, may unintentionally hurt sensitive colleagues or reduce motivation.

weaknesses.label: Impatient with Routine
weaknesses.description: Easily frustrated by repetitive or monotonous tasks, occasionally distracted.

strengths.label: Goal-Oriented
strengths.description: Quickly clarifies problems and proposes solutions.

strengths.label: Strong Execution
strengths.description: Capable of translating strategic planning into actionable steps.

strengths.label: Precision & Carefulness
strengths.description: Pays attention to details, data, and logic, patiently reviewing issues.

strengths.label: Balanced Rationality & Collaboration
strengths.description: Maintains balance between analytical thinking and team interaction.

weaknesses.label: Tendency to Play Safe
weaknesses.description: Overly cautious or perfectionist; may be conservative in quick decision-making.

weaknesses.label: Focus on Efficiency
weaknesses.description: High drive and efficiency can conflict with maintaining interpersonal harmony.

weaknesses.label: Socially Reserved
weaknesses.description: Low social energy; networking or persuading others may be draining.
